lead_paragraph: In-form batsman Usman Khawaja has been selected to play his first one-day international in three years when Australia meet New Zealand in the second match of their series in Wellington on Saturday.

headline.print_headline: Khawaja Gets ODI Chance After Overlooked for NZ Opener
headline.main: Khawaja Gets ODI Chance After Overlooked for NZ Opener

snippet: In-form batsman Usman Khawaja has been selected to play his first one-day international in three years when Australia meet New Zealand in the second match of their series in Wellington on Saturday....
